#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,d,sum=0,i,arr[21];
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&d);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
        }
        sort(arr,arr+n,greater<int>());
        for(i=d;i<n;i++)
        {
            sum=sum+arr[i];
        }
        cout<<sum<<"\n";
    }
}
